data.title: Moulin Rouge! The Movie: discover the myth behind the musical
data.meta_description: Are you ready to uncover the myths and secrets behind the Moulin Rouge musical? Discover the award-winning movie’s dramatic love story and captivating backdrop.
data.text:
THE MOULIN ROUGE’S SPORTING SUMMER: A PEEK BEHIND THE SCENES

It’s the event of the summer: Paris is hosting the 2024 Olympic Games! This summer of sport in the capital couldn’t suit the Moulin Rouge and its artists any better: after all, the cabaret maintains close links with the world of sport, and is taking advantage of July’s events to strengthen them even more. On the agenda: the Olympic torch relay, rhythmic gymnastics and rugby sevens!

RINGING IN THE OLYMPICS AT THE MOULIN ROUGE!

A festive atmosphere with costumes in red, white and blue, and an exhilarating French Cancan: on 15 July the dancers from the Moulin Rouge lit up the streets for the Olympic torch! A moment of magical spectacle, captured here in a selection of photos.

Dancer and mother: behind the scene of the Moulin Rouge

Being a mother isn’t easy! That’s a statement that Audrey – the dance captain for the French Cancan dancers at the Moulin Rouge – can certainly agree with.

The Moulin Rouge x Lastelier Chapter II: where fashion and daring meet

Following on from an initial chapter released last autumn, the Moulin Rouge and Lastelier continue their joint creative adventure with a radiant, festive collection that’s just in time for the sunny days ahead!

Pearls & Wonders Collection: when party spirit elevates the elegance of pearls

Traditional, elegant and extravagant: the pearl makes a dazzling entrance at the Moulin Rouge! A flagship trend this year, it is at the heart of the latest collaboration between the Moulin Rouge and On Aura Tout Vu.
